## Config.SystemConfiguration.getConfig() method

Returns the [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) that this [SystemConfiguration](./ts-res.config.systemconfiguration.md) was created from.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getConfig(): Result<ISystemConfiguration>;
```
**Returns:**

Result&lt;ISystemConfiguration&gt;

`Success` with the [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) if successful, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
